document_data.name: ''Tiara of Stars''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''tiara of stars''''' was a unique [[magic item]] in the form of a diadem that was sacred to the goddess [[Sel√ªne]]. It was worn by the Priestess of the High Moonlight, the head of the [[House of the Moon]] temple in [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Powers: It had a number of unique, unspecified powers. Among these, it functioned as a ''[[crown of leadership]]''.
document_data.History: In the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], [[Naneatha Suaril]] wore the ''tiara of stars'' on formal occasions and when required.
